description: Five comedians are set tasks challenging their creativity and wit. The tasks are supervised by Alex Horne but the Taskmaster, Greg Davies, always has the final word.
title: Taskmaster

episodes.title: Melon Buffet
episodes.description: Schoolmasterly Greg Davies sets five fellow comedians - including Tim Key and Frank Skinner - devious tasks in this offbeat challenge show. First up: melon-eating.

episodes.title: The Pie Whisperer
episodes.description: Comedians get competitive as devious Greg Davies sets them absurd challenges. Identifying pie contents and making a film backwards are on the agenda here.

episodes.title: The Poet and the Egg
episodes.description: Celebs leave their dignity at the door as dastardly Mr Gilbert - aka Greg Davies - sets them some truly bizarre tasks, including building an egg tower.

episodes.title: Down an Octave
episodes.description: Greg Davies lays down tricky tasks to a gaggle of comics. Josh Widdicombe and Frank Skinner are two of the poor souls who have to fill an eggcup with tears.

episodes.title: Little Denim Shorts
episodes.description: Pro celebrity suffering in Greg Davies' comedy challenge series! Frank Skinner takes a boulder onto a train. And can the comedians make a Swede blush?

episodes.title: The Last Supper
episodes.description: A round of mini-golf using eggs, picking blue sweets out using boxing gloves and making a meal using ingredients representing each letter of the alphabet are among the challenges in the series finale.
